subject: Re: [junit] reg. JUnit
msgSnippet: Pallavi, it goes something like this: public class AddInt { public int add(int a, int b) { return a + b; } } public class TestAddInt extends TestCase { public
messageBody:
Pallavi,

it goes something like this:

public class AddInt {
public int add(int a, int b) {
return a + b;
}
}

public class TestAddInt extends TestCase {
public TestAddInt(String testName) {
super(testName);
}

public void testAdd() {
int a = 1;
int b = 2;
int expected = a + b;
assertEquals(expected, new AddInt().add(a, b));
}
}

Hope that helps.
=jason
